parameters.name: SideToSide
parameters.description: True to flip the picture side to side, false to flip the picture top to bottom (see Remarks )

title: ISketchPicture.Flip
description: Flips the picture, in its same position, either side to side or top to bottom.

parameters.name: SideToSide
parameters.description: True to flip the picture side to side, false to flip the picture top to bottom (see Remarks )

returns: True if the picture is flipped, false if not
remarks:
If you flip the picture...
Then the
angle
...
side to side
remains the same and the
ISketchPicture::Flipped
property returns true.
top to bottom
increments by 180
and the ISketchPicture::Flipped property returns true.
side to side and top to bottom
rotates 180
and ISketchPicture::Flipped
returns false.
